entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:53 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -40.7°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023
